name: PaymentCardAgreement
definition: account-specific credit agreement that specifies the terms and conditions under which the payment card is offered to the cardholder by the issuer
label: payment card agreement

name: CommercialCreditCardAgreement
explanatoryNote: Corporate card programs come in more than one form to serve different business needs. In general, they are contractual agreements between a sponsoring entity and a financial institution, in which the financial institution issues corporate cards to select employees of the sponsoring company.
definition: credit card agreement for a card issued to, or in conjunction with, a formal organization, such as a small business, middle market business, local, state, or national government, or large corporation
label: commercial credit card agreement

name: CreditCardAgreement
definition: account-specific credit facility that specifies the terms and conditions under which the credit card is offered to the cardholder by the issuer
label: credit card agreement

name: CardProduct
label: card product
definition: financial product involving the issuance of credit, debit, or other payment cards

name: CreditCardAccount
definition: card account whose terms and conditions are defined in a credit card agreement that is represented by a credit card
label: credit card account

name: CardAccount
definition: account whose terms and conditions are defined in a card agreement that is represented by a payment card
label: card account

name: Cardholder
label: cardholder
definition: account holder to whom a payment card is issued

name: ConsumerCreditCardAgreement
definition: credit card agreement for a card issued for household, family, or other personal expenditures that is accessed by a borrower's use of a credit card
label: consumer credit card agreement

name: CardValidationCode2
label: card validation code 2
definition: card verification value specifically for Mastercard payment cards

name: ThreeDigitVerificationCodeValue
definition: card verification code that is the rightmost three-digit value printed in the signature panel area on the back of the card
label: three-digit verification code or value

name: DebitCardAccount
definition: card account that is represented by a one or more debit cards
label: debit card account

name: SmartCard
label: smart card
definition: payment card that has integrated circuits embedded within it
explanatoryNote: The circuits, also referred to as the 'chip,' contain payment card data including but not limited to data equivalent to the magnetic-stripe data.

name: PaymentCard
definition: legal document issued by a financial services provider that enables the cardholder to access the funds in the customer's designated bank accounts, or through a credit account and make payments by electronic funds transfer and access automated teller machines (ATMs)
explanatoryNote: For purposes of Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS), a payment card is any payment card/device that bears the logo of the founding members of PCI SSC, which are American Express, Discover Financial Services, JCB International, MasterCard, or Visa, Inc.
label: payment card

name: CardVerificationCodeValue
label: card verification code or value
definition: code that specifies either (1) magnetic-stripe data, or (2) printed security features that are used to protect data integrity and limit alteration, counterfeiting and fraud generally

name: DebitCard
definition: payment card issued by a financial service provider that enables the cardholder to access funds in a demand deposit account
label: debit card

name: CreditCardProduct
label: credit card product
definition: card product allowing the holder to purchase goods or services on credit

name: CardAuthenticationValue
label: card authentication value
definition: card verification value specifically for JCB payment cards

name: MagneticStripeVerificationCodeValue
label: magnetic stripe verification code or value
definition: card verification code on a card's magnetic stripe that uses secure cryptographic processes to protect data integrity on the stripe, and reveals any alteration or counterfeiting

name: CardIdentificationNumber
label: card identification number
definition: card verification value specifically for American Express and Discover payment cards

name: DebitCardProduct
definition: card product card typically provided by a depository institution allowing the holder to transfer money electronically to another account when making a purchase
label: debit card product

name: CreditCard
label: credit card
definition: card issued by a financial service provider that enables the cardholder to borrow funds
explanatoryNote: In its non-physical form, a credit card represents a payment mechanism which facilitates both consumer and commercial business transactions, including purchases and cash advances. A credit card generally operates as a substitute for cash or a check and most often provides an unsecured revolving line of credit. The borrower is required to pay at least part of the card's outstanding balance each billing cycle, depending on the terms as set forth in the cardholder agreement. As the debt reduces, the available credit increases for accounts in good standing. These complex financial arrangements have ever-shifting terms and prices. A charge card differs from a credit card in that the charge card must be paid in full each month.

name: CardSecurityCode
definition: card verification value specifically for American Express payment cards
label: card security code

name: CreditCardNetwork
definition: classifier for the network that authorizes, processes, and sets the terms of credit card transactions, as well as transfers payments between shoppers, merchants, and their banks
label: credit card network

name: IssuingFinancialInstitution
label: issuing financial institution
definition: issuer and financial services provider that issues payment cards or performs, facilitates, or supports issuing services including but not limited to issuing banks and issuing processors

name: CardValidationCode
label: card validation code
definition: card verification code specifically for Mastercard payment cards

name: CardExpirationDate
definition: date on which a given payment card expires
label: card expiration date

name: CardVerificationValue2
definition: card verification value specifically for Visa payment cards
label: card verification value 2

name: PrimaryCardAccountNumber
definition: composite identifier of 14 or 16 digits embossed on a bank or payment card and encoded in the card's magnetic strip
explanatoryNote: The PAN identifies the issuer of the card and the account including part of the account number, and contains a check digit that verifies the authenticity of the embossed account number.
label: primary card account number

name: CardVerificationValue
label: card verification value
definition: card verification value specifically for Visa and Discover payment cards

name: CardAuthenticationValue2
label: card authentication value 2
definition: card verification value specifically for JCB payment cards

name: hasCardVerificationCode
label: has card verification code
definition: links a credit card to either: (1) magnetic-stripe data, or (2) printed security features that are used to protect data integrity and limit alteration, counterfeiting and fraud generally

name: usesCurrency
label: uses currency
definition: indicates the currency defined for the credit card product

name: DiscoverNetwork
label: Discover network
definition: credit card network and card issuer offering benefits like secondary rental car collision insurance

name: JCBNetwork
explanatoryNote: JCB Co., Ltd., (formerly Japan Credit Bureau) is a credit card company based in Tokyo, Japan. As of 2020, it operates in 23 countries with over 130 million customers. In the United States, it is not a primary credit card network but has an association with the Discover Network to enable use of JCB cards.
label: JCB network
definition: credit card network based in Japan, with coverage throughout Asia, with strategic partners worldwide

name: MastercardNetwork
definition: credit card network that has its own suite of card protections and benefits, such as identity theft protection and extended warranties
label: Mastercard network

name: VisaNetwork
label: Visa network
definition: credit card network that oversees the Visa Signature benefits associated with certain credit cards, such as premium rental car privileges and hotel perks

name: hasCreditCardNetwork
definition: indicates the underlying network for credit card product
label: has credit card network

name: hasPrimaryAccountNumber
label: has primary account number
definition: specifies the account number displayed on the face of the card

name: AmericanExpressNetwork
label: American Express network
definition: credit card network and card issuer that both issues credit cards and processes payments for cards bearing its logo, as well as offering cardholder benefits like travel insurance
